title: FP91G
author: FP91G
content: SKYDOGENET - Drivechain fork (bitcoin core + BIPs 300 and 301) - Welcome to POW...https://skydoge.net/Network specifications:Total supply: 210 billionAlgorithm: SkydogeSubsidy halving interval: 2100000 blocks (each 4 years), 4 timesBlock time: 1 minuteDifficulty adjustment: 60 minutesBlock initial reward: 50 000 SKYDOGEMaturity: 100 confirmationsDrivechain current sidechains that could be implemented and activated in Skydogenet:Zside (Zcash sidechain)Ethside (Ethereum sidechain)Bitassets (NFT sidechain)Thunder (big blocks sidechain / scaling solution)SkyDoge is listed on Xeggexhttps://xeggex.com/post/new_listing_skydogenet_skydogehttps://xeggex.com/market/SKYDOGE_USDThttps://xeggex.com/market/SKYDOGE_DOGEPoolshttps://miningpoolstats.stream/skydoge

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: So basically mr v and his meth has buried all of gpu mining ⛏️ no real substantial coin for all those gpus.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: philipma1957 on July 06, 2023, 01:27:23 PMSo basically mr v and his meth has buried all of gpu mining ⛏️ no real substantial coin for all those gpus.Dead and gone for now! The new project would really have to be huge or at least close to what Ethereum was, if the profitability is going to be meaningful. Imagine all the GPUs waiting out there for the next most profitable coin

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 10, 2023, 10:57:18 PMQuote from: philipma1957 on July 06, 2023, 01:27:23 PMSo basically mr v and his meth has buried all of gpu mining ⛏️ no real substantial coin for all those gpus.Dead and gone for now! The new project would really have to be huge or at least close to what Ethereum was, if the profitability is going to be meaningful. Imagine all the GPUs waiting out there for the next most profitable coin  A new project may make mining on old video cards unprofitable and require a video card with more memory to cut off all the old series. Nvidia can make a new ethereum with a 12 GB DAG file and buy these coins to stimulate sales of new video cards. Asics will not be able to mine such an algorithm, they have no more than 8 GB of memory.

comments.body: Welcome to cluster bomb ammunition lamers..

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 10, 2023, 10:57:18 PMQuote from: philipma1957 on July 06, 2023, 01:27:23 PMSo basically mr v and his meth has buried all of gpu mining ⛏️ no real substantial coin for all those gpus.Dead and gone for now! The new project would really have to be huge or at least close to what Ethereum was, if the profitability is going to be meaningful. Imagine all the GPUs waiting out there for the next most profitable coin  Yeah eth switching killed that market.  But I'm not gonna lie once we enter another bull who knows.  It happens every culycle where we think a certain subset of mining gear is dead and then bam bull market and some new project comes along driving everyone to buy at insane prices again.  Maybe dead but who knows

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: wheelz1200 on July 12, 2023, 09:55:48 PMYeah eth switching killed that market.  But I'm not gonna lie once we enter another bull who knows.  It happens every culycle where we think a certain subset of mining gear is dead and then bam bull market and some new project comes along driving everyone to buy at insane prices again.  Maybe dead but who knows Time will tell for sure, but I feel like this bull market is going to be a little different, especially for the GPU miners. Remember, we don't have any much of those quality POW projects in the recent times with many trying to go by the POS-environment/climate-friendly coin narrative which I call bullshit.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on July 13, 2023, 11:50:48 PMQuote from: wheelz1200 on July 12, 2023, 09:55:48 PMYeah eth switching killed that market.  But I'm not gonna lie once we enter another bull who knows.  It happens every culycle where we think a certain subset of mining gear is dead and then bam bull market and some new project comes along driving everyone to buy at insane prices again.  Maybe dead but who knows Time will tell for sure, but I feel like this bull market is going to be a little different, especially for the GPU miners. Remember, we don't have any much of those quality POW projects in the recent times with many trying to go by the POS-environment/climate-friendly coin narrative which I call bullshit.Now ASIC manufacturers have learned to make ASICs for new coins very quickly, if it is profitable. And next season, mining on hard drives may be popular due to low power consumption, and there are not even good coin projects for mining on video cards.

comments.author: FP91G
comments.body: Information from our chat: “There are currently only 2 miners for this algorithm: WildRig Multi and CCMiner.Only WildRig can be used in the Hive os.The SkyDoge-optimized version of CCMiner works only on Windows, but produces on average 2 times more hashrate."https://t.me/koliamainer/9665I haven't checked this information
